org.apache.rat.plugin

Class BaseRatMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRatMojo

    public abstract class BaseRatMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Generated class to provide Maven support for standard Rat command line options

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<String,List<String>> args
      A map of CLI based arguments to values.

        value - the value to set.

        Parameters:

        @Deprecated
 @Parameter(property="rat.AddLicense")
public void setAddLicense(boolean addLicense)

        Parameters:

      • setEditLicense

        @Parameter(property="rat.EditLicense")
public void setEditLicense(boolean editLicense)
        Add the default license header to any file with an unknown license that is not in the exclusion list. By default new files will be created with the license header, to force the modification of existing files use the <editOverwrite> option.
        Parameters:
        editLicense - the state

      • setLicensesDenied

        @Parameter
public void setLicensesDenied(String[] licensesDenied)
        The denied License IDs. These licenses will be removed to the list of approved licenses. Once licenses are removed they can not be added back. Arguments should be LicenseID. (See Argument Types for clarification)
        Parameters:
        licensesDenied - denied License IDs.

      • setLicensesDenied

        @Parameter
public void setLicensesDenied(String licensesDenied)

        Parameters:
        licensesDenied - denied License IDs.
